软件包 com.taobao.datax.common.plugin
的使用

使用 com.taobao.datax.common.plugin 的软件包
com.taobao.datax.common.plugin   
com.taobao.datax.common.util   
com.taobao.datax.engine.conf   
com.taobao.datax.engine.plugin   
com.taobao.datax.engine.schedule   
com.taobao.datax.engine.storage   
 

com.taobao.datax.common.plugin 使用的 com.taobao.datax.common.plugin 中的类
Line
          Represents one record of data which may be in database, HDFS, etc.
LineReceiver
          DataX use Storage to help Reader and Writer to exchange data, Writer uses LineReceiver to get data from Storage(Usually in memory).
LineSender
          DataX use Storage to help Reader and Writer to exchange data,s Reader use LineSender to put data into Storage.
MetaData
          MetaData records a source or sink Database meta information.
MetaData.Column
           
Plugin
          Define basic methods which concrete plugins should implement.
PluginMonitor
          Monitor monitors Plugin status, record number of lines, failed number of lines, etc.
PluginParam
          PluginParam represents some key-value params defined in job xml for Plugin.
PluginStatus
          State of Plugin.
